generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with visible lane markings extending into the distance.
- sidewalk: A sidewalk is visible along the right side of the road, bordered by a curb and adjacent to a building.
- building: Multiple buildings are visible on both sides of the street, including multi-story residential or commercial structures.
- wall: A stone wall is visible on the right side of the image, forming part of the building's exterior.
- vegetation: Trees are visible along the street, particularly on the left side and in the distance.
- sky: A portion of the sky is visible above the buildings and trees, appearing overcast.
- person: A person is visible sitting on the sidewalk on the right side of the image, near some bags.
- car: Several cars are parked along the left side of the street, and a few are visible further down the road.
- traffic sign: A circular traffic sign is visible on a pole on the right side of the street.
- traffic light: A traffic light is visible in the distance, hanging above the street.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including those supporting the traffic light and traffic signs.
- terrain: A small patch of grass or terrain is visible near the sidewalk on the left side of the image.
